'''Shimi Chazuke''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Unagi Chazuke]] with [[Wanderer]]. The [[recipe]] for Unagi Chazuke is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] at [[Shimura's]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Unagi Chazuke increases the party's Healing Bonus by '''25%''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
